title: Few Sunnah things imam should say before leading the prayer that Prophet used to say Assim al hakeem
transcript: um i was wondering if you could kindly just list a few of the authentic um sayings that one should say before they are leading the prayer you know to tell people to straighten the wrong was given so that the people stand up for the congregational prayer he would say is meaning fix your rose straighten it up he used to say aligned by your shoulders and leave no gaps shaytan do not leave gaps between you for satan to come in between lino be soft in your brothers or brethren's hands meaning don't fight over and push and be kind and be soft in coming together complete the first row then the second row and and and so forth these are some of the authentic things that the prophet used to say allah
